title: PC_StoneLoops (codeminion) -ToeD
description:
The One Eyed Dude 

    provides you with


===> StoneLoops! of Jurassica (c) Codeminion <===

==-> ripped: nothing  <-+-> added: experience  <-==



<->( about )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

StoneLoops! is an amazingly dynamic puzzle-arcade gameset in the
prehistoric world of Jurassica. 
Thanks to unique gameplay mechanics and non-stop action, it&#039;s bound 
to please even the most selective gamers. Take a trip through the five 
colorful realms of Jurassica from wild jungle, through endless glacier, 
to the edge of a blazing volcano. 

Own five houses and collect 24 trophies in this crazy, action-packed 
adventure. 75 handcrafted levels, three modes of play and a vast 


number of powerups makes StoneLoops! an incredibly fun game for 
both fans of a strategic challenge and those who just want to let off
some steam and smash some stuff into tiny little pieces!.

Happy Gaming, 


<->( Hardware Requirements )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

? Windows 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista



<->( how to play )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

1.: Unrar with WinRar ( newest! ) ... or use 7zip.

2.: double click: StoneLoopsSetup.exe and install the Game!.

3.: copy crackStoneLoops.exe to your installed GameFolder, and play the game!

( at the register screen you can type *ANY* Name/Serialkey you wish )



<->( general hints )<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->

 in every life we have some trouble... when you worry you make it double!

<-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><-><->
